content: ***there s nothing quite like a great movie your favorite spot on the couch and a handmade blanket cuddle up with the avon throw blanket for your next netflix binge session *** playful puff stitches dot either end of the blanket adding texture and visual interest the body is a sea of single_crochet stitches allowing you to get into the groove of this quick and easy project you ll be planning your next afghan before you finish the first pattern includes a full tutorial video **materials** -11 skeins lion brand hue + me in the color desert substitute 1400 yards of category 5 bulky weight yarn -10mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle **techniques** -basic stitches -turned row -puff stitches -reading a crochet chart **measurements** one size - 55 long x 45 wide find the free version of the avon throw blanket here 1 // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/avon-throw-chunky-crochet-blanket-pattern-tutorial
